Methods in de.tif.jacob.core.data that return IDataTableRecord
 IDataTableRecord IDataAccessor.cloneRecord(IDataTransaction trans, IDataTableRecord recordToClone)
          Same behaviour than IDataAccessor.cloneRecord(IDataTransaction, IDataTableRecord, ITableAlias) except that the alias to clone the record for equals to the related alias of recordToClone.
 IDataTableRecord IDataAccessor.cloneRecord(IDataTransaction trans, IDataTableRecord recordToClone, ITableAlias alias)
          Clones the given table record, i.e. create a new table record for the specified table alias and copies the field values from the record to clone to the new record.
 IDataTableRecord IDataAccessor.cloneRecord(IDataTransaction trans, IDataTableRecord recordToClone, java.lang.String aliasName)
          Same behaviour than IDataAccessor.cloneRecord(IDataTransaction, IDataTableRecord, ITableAlias) except that the alias to clone the record for is specified by name.

          Returns the record of the given table alias that is linked to this record.

          Returns the data table record given by its primary key.

          Returns the data table record given by its index.

          Loads the data table record given by its primary key from the data source.

          Creates a new record in the underlying data source.
 IDataTableRecord IDataTable.reloadSelectedRecord()
          Refreshes the selected record by means of reloading it from data source.
 IDataTableRecord IDataTable.setSelectedRecord(IDataKeyValue primaryKey)
          Sets the selected record of this data table given by its primary key.
 IDataTableRecord IDataTable.updateSelectedRecord(IRelationSet relationSet)
          Brings the selected record into the update mode, by means of executing the following steps: locking the record reloading the record from database propagating the current record by use of the given relationset.
 IDataTableRecord IDataTable.updateSelectedRecord(java.lang.String relationSetName)
          Brings the selected record into the update mode, by means of executing the following steps: locking the record reloading the record from database propagating the current record by use of the given relationset.

 boolean IDataTableSearchIterateCallback.onNextRecord(IDataTableRecord record)
          This method will be called for each record retrieved until no further records are available or this method returns false to signal that the iteration should be stopped.
